description:
Yamabuki married the Nura Clan`s second head Rihan, but as a result of Hagoromo Gitsune`s curse on Nurarihyon, the two were unable to have children. Yamabuki Otome disappeared, presumably dead, after leaving Rihan a note containing a haiku that described her pain of not being able to bear any children for him. She was revived in the form of a child to become http://anidb.net/ch34635 [Hagoromo Gitsune]`s host.
source: wikia.com
name: Yamabuki Otome
